reviewText: Another of Dev Anand's creation with a number of veterans to boost the quality of the movie. Resolution in this edition not at  its best. But the audio is at its best for the sound and the songs by the veteran singers of the Indian  Entertainment are a real treat. Dev and Kalpana  have taken this movie to its highest level.

This is a fabulous and remarkable movie, deserves 6 stars out of 5. The music by S.D.Burman deserves Noble Prize and is at par with movies like Kashmir-ki-kali by O.P. Nayyar. Wish they make movie like this now-a-days.
